body: Not much changed about the situation. There are still lots of uses of `make_position_params` in combination with `buf_request` / `buf_request_all` - all of which would be broken with mixed encoding.

rename.to: LSP: promote utf-8 and utf-32 positionEncodings

issue.title: feat(lsp): support multiple clients in lsp.buf.references

repository.name: neovim
repository.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

issue.title: feat(lsp)!: support multiple clients in goto methods

- https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/30034

  and method)
- https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/22318

Might fix: https://github.com/neovim/neovim/issues/30737

issue.title: fix(lsp): handle mixed encoding in tagfunc params

body: @mfussenegger with all the multi-client fixes, Is there any progress we can make here?
